long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Relax, We’ve Got Your Quizzes Covered: Your Hassle-Free Study Companion

As fellow students, we understand the challenges of learning firsthand. That's why we created QuizMate: With the click of a button, your virtual study partner will provide you with a quick and concise answer in no time. Our AI-powered assistant is always ready to help you with your queries and guide you through your learning journey. Join the QuizMate community of over 10,000 students today and uncover the ultimate study companion.

Cross-Platform Functionality: QuizMate is compatible with leading platforms such as Canvas, McGraw Hill, Blackboard, Moodle, and many more.

Snapshot:  Capture any question from any website effortlessly and receive immediate answers in the extension popup, making it an ideal tool for solving multiple-choice questions.

Right Click Anywhere: Simply highlight any question on a website, right-click, and select "Ask QuizMate." A popup will appear with the correct answer.

In-Depth Explanations: Receive comprehensive explanations to help you understand the fundamental concepts and reasoning behind each solution.

Lecture Learn: With just one click, effortlessly transcribe your lectures, as well as YouTube videos, into concise, easy-to-understand notes.

Artificial Intelligence: With our upgraded artificial intelligence model, learning is undergoing a transformative shift, delivering superior responses and explanations. Welcome our latest innovation, the AI Context feature, engineered to boost answer accuracy by analyzing the content within your notes. Prepare for boundless learning opportunities ahead.

Need Help? Contact us at support@quizmate.io
